snippet.title: Matchmaking & More RNG - Party Jam 2021 (Devlog 8)
snippet.description:
I might need to experience what the industry refers to as... "Crunch"...

***

Check out the featured artists!

Bagged_Milkk: https://www.instagram.com/bagged_milkk/

MojoKing: https://www.youtube.com/c/MojoKingMusic/featured

Musithical: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOQUeOve1ij-ZyXmIpFUPeA

***

This is one of the probably 10ish devlogs I will be making outlining my progress in the Amazon, and Beamable hosted PARTY GAME JAM on GameJolt. 

As Mr. Amazon said himself on the Party Jam page, the requirements for the jam is to: "Create a multiplayer party game in 10 days for a chance to win cash, showcase your game on the homepage of Twitch AND pitch your game to publishers + investors!" - Someone at Amazon, and/or Beamable 2021.

I will be working, supported by my good Texan friend Cole (AKA Commander Default).

***

Today was a relatively busy day (with other things), so not a lot actually happened in the game's progress. However, what did happen were MAJOR steps to completing it. The game finally has proper matchmaking, which is a SUPER important feature for games like this. I also added a system for selecting random minigames, which is important to give it that much more charm and the ever so important gameplay-esque feeling! I also need to wake up early to select courses for my third year at UofT. Goodnight all!

Check out the GameJam here: https://gamejolt.com/c/partyjam

As well as that, check out my GameJolt page where I have posted a good handful of my past games: https://gamejolt.com/@sayincraft_studios

***

Check me out on other social media platforms as well! I appreciate the support! :)

I post content on many of my other games in the works, and I have a ton of exciting announcements to make soon!

***

*Join the Sayincraft Discord server for special events!*

Sayincraft Studios (Official Discord) Link: https://discord.gg/R6fERkE

***

Stay tuned for more updates, videos, and games from Sayincraft Studios!

Social Media and Stuff:

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/sayincraft

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sayincraft/#

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Sayincraft

https://www.sayincraft.com/

***

Everybody needs a little CONSOLATION!

(Music from my game: "The Art of Humanizing a Pixel"'s Official Soundtrack, and composed by the talented MojoKing!)

Find it on Sayin Music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxOkwCdoSiGF-5OINATs3_g
